schedule.comment: Time format: HH:MM (24-hour format). Leave empty to start immediately

tasks.prompt: Use the nano-banana model to create a 1/7 scale commercialised figure of the subjects in the illustration, in a realistic style and environment. Place the figure on a computer desk, using a circular transparent acrylic base without any text. On the computer screen, display the Brush modelling process of the figure, Next to the computer screen, place a toy packaging box printed with the original artwork(or image) with the title suitable for this object and a CL icon in the bottom right .

Create a 1/7 scale commercialized figurine of the subjects in the picture, in a realistic style, placed on a computer desk in a real environment. The figurine has a round transparent acrylic base with no text. On the computer screen, show the ZBrush modeling process of this figurine. Next to the screen, place a packaging box with rounded corners and a transparent front window. The side of the box should also feature the characterâ€™s photo. The box design should be cute with a touch of luxury, and the figurine inside the box should be clearly visible.

comments.folder_structure: Each task folder should contain 'Source' and 'Generated_Output' subfolders
comments.reference_folder: Optional: Path to folder containing third set of images for 3-way comparison
comments.template_usage: use_comparison_template: true uses comparison_template_path (3 placeholders), false uses template_path (2 placeholders)
